attributes.action: Allow Mr Tul Bahadur Pun VC indefinite leave to stay in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tul Bahadur Pun VC a former Ghurka who won the Victoria Cross for extreme valor in WW2 has had his application for leave to stay in the UK declined as he failed to show strong enough ties to the UK.  This 84 year old hero needs good medical care and is at the very least owed this by the country he served so valianty

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
